subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: After bouncing a drive off a spectator’s bag and into the fairway, then hitting his second shot into a bunker behind the green, Fred Couples knocked a 35-yard shot out of the sand and into the hole to win $75,000 at the Skins Game in Indian Wells, Calif. Couples, 48, had not played competitively for almost eight months because of back trouble.
